introText: Welcome aboard! We’re thrilled to have you join us. Our mission is to create unforgettable experiences together.

items.title: Explore University's Mission, Values, and Culture
items.description: Learn about our University’s mission, values, and culture through engaging multimedia presentations and articles. Earn points and badges for completing interactive modules and quizzes.

items.title: Take a Virtual Campus Tour
items.description: Immerse yourself in our campus environment with 360-degree photos and interactive maps. Complete challenges by virtually visiting key locations and earn points for exploration.

sections.title: Completion of Employment Contracts and Forms

items.title: Fill out Required Documents
items.description: Complete employment contracts, tax forms, and legal documents conveniently online. Earn points for each form completed accurately and within deadlines.

items.title: Submit Identification and Qualification Documents
items.description: Upload scanned copies of identification documents (e.g., ID, passport) and academic qualifications. Receive badges for document submission and verification.

items.title: Create Your University Email
items.description: Set up your university email account hassle-free with step-by-step instructions. Earn points for successfully configuring the email account on personal devices.

items.title: Assistance with Device Setup
items.description: Access video tutorials and guides for configuring personal devices for work purposes. Earn points for completing device setup tasks.

sections.title: Request Access Cards or Keys Online

items.title: Secure Your Access
items.description: Easily request access cards or keys online with integrated approval processes. Achieve a 'Facility Access Pro' badge for completing access-related tasks.

items.title: Gain Access to Systems
items.description: Access academic and administrative systems conveniently through a single sign-on portal. Earn points for accessing and navigating these systems efficiently.

sections.title: Mandatory Training Programs and Compliance Courses

items.title: Enroll in Essential Training
items.description: Enroll in mandatory training programs and compliance courses to enhance your skills and knowledge. Earn points for completing each module, with certificates as rewards.

items.title: Explore Professional Development
items.description: Browse and register for available workshops, conferences, and skill-building sessions. Gain access to exclusive skill-building challenges with points and skill badges.

items.title: Get to Know Your Department
items.description: Access department-specific introductory videos and profiles of colleagues. Connect with colleagues through virtual meet-and-greet sessions and earn social badges.

items.title: Understand Department Policies
items.description: Access and acknowledge department-specific policies and procedures. Complete policy quizzes for points and compliance badges.

items.title: Discover Library Resources
items.description: Attend virtual library orientation sessions or explore an interactive library tour. Participate in library treasure hunts and earn explorer badges.

items.title: Access Research Databases
items.description: Gain access to research databases and academic journals with a single login. Complete database searches and earn researcher badges.

items.title: Understand Your Benefits
items.description: View multimedia presentations explaining employee benefits. Complete benefits quizzes and earn benefits knowledge badges.

items.title: Review University Policies
items.description: Review and acknowledge university policies on work hours, leave, and HR matters. Earn compliance badges for policy acknowledgment.

items.title: Access Campus Services
items.description: Access information on campus dining, transportation, wellness services, and parking. Use virtual coupons for dining, earn transit points, or unlock wellness challenges.

items.title: Apply for Parking Permits and Transportation Cards
items.description: Apply for parking permits or public transportation cards online. Receive parking hero badges for successfully securing parking permits.
